Html:
Before Codeplex goes into read-only mode and shutdown 2 months later.
I want to say thanks, i want to say bye, i still want to say why? More than 5 years of my life, i discover this journey, with good and bad times on codeplex. I like Codeplex because it is not just a platform to share code from one developer to another like github, and is not only a platform to share open source applications like sourceforge - it is both together. Nice Landing Pages for end-customers and powerful code sharing behind. This is why codeplex is unique.

(Thanks to Mark Grooves - the best codeplex chief Microsoft ever had and Jonathan Wanagel and all the others)

I will miss codeplex<3

*Sebastian




Any last message are welcome here

Hi Sebastian,

is this the end from NetOffice-Project?
hopefully not!

thanks for your work!
Sven

I still want to contribute NetOffice by submit code. But i do not act as person in -then- github repository "NetOfficeFw".
NetOffice 1.7.4.1 comes out before codeplex is going into read-only mode. #promise

*Sebastian
The NetOffice project will be continue at https://github.com/NetOfficeFw
